subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Tooltip UI component.

subMembers.name: titleComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [titleTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: titleRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [titleTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: dxTooltip
properties.description: The Tooltip UI component displays a tooltip for a specified element on the page.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onHiding
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: onShown
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is displayed.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HiddenEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hidden] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HidingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hiding] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShowingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [showing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [shown] event handler's argument.
